name: Rise of the High Elf King: A LEGACY OF BLOOD
name_original: Rise of the High Elf King: A LEGACY OF BLOOD
description:
Lady and gentlemen, boys and girls. Today I have a spectacle to show you, the likes of which have never been seen before, and shall ever be seen again. An adventure of epic proportions that spans massive territories far and wide with a large number of interactable npcs and environments.

You will take on the role of our protagonist in his epic rise to power in this 2D side scroller set in a world of magic and fantasy.

Be enthralled by this dark comedy, which is sure to be classified as a timeless masterpiece by generations to come.


Feature music from artist such as:


Stanely Vanagan

Tommy Giovanni

Dan Bermender



Thank you for checking out my game and I hope you have enjoyed it.

Much love,

Jake Welch / Indi game maker
